TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityTemplateFactory extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用在執行階段動態資料來取得資料表實體範本執行個體。The class is used at run time by Dynamic Data to get an instance of an entity template for a table. 實體範本必須套用至整個資料表資料列，而不是單一資料欄位中，使用者控制項和欄位的範本。Entity templates are user controls that apply to a whole table row instead of a single data field, as with field templates. 實體範本時，會顯示在頁面上，使用類別。The entity templates are displayed on a page by using the class. 它們可以用於欄位範本顯示的資料模型中的值。They use field templates to display values from the data model. 動態資料會提供預設實體範本 ~\DynamicData\EntityTemplates 資料夾中找到。Dynamic Data provides default entity templates that are found in the ~\DynamicData\EntityTemplates folder. 您可以修改這些預設實體範本，或建立自訂的外觀和行為的資料表。You can modify these default entity templates or create custom ones to change the appearance and behavior for a table. 顯示範本、 編輯和插入作業。There are templates for display, edit, and insert operations. ## Examples 如需如何使用實體範本的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 自訂表格配置使用實體範本](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/03d33a22-d3c0-41df-a717-82ce86329a08)。For an example of how to use entity templates, see [Walkthrough: Customizing Table Layout Using Entity Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/03d33a22-d3c0-41df-a717-82ce86329a08).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: templateName
param.span: 要為其建置路徑之實體範本的名稱。

span.span: The name of the entity template for which to build the path.
The display mode of the entity template.

summary.span: 建置所指定資料表的實體範本路徑。

span.span: Builds the path of the entity template for the specified table.

returns.span: 所指定資料表的實體範本路徑。

span.span: The path of the entity template for the specified table.
